sysevent_email_action.description: Notification invokes by 'x_wec_solara_admin.key.created' event from Scripted REST: 'Entitlement API' method 'Create entitlement'. Event contains next parameters: - First parameter - recipient email - Second parameter - Data object encoded to json Encoded data object is used in email message through notification email scripts.
sysevent_email_action.message_html:
Thanks, your account is now activated!
Your API key is now provisioned and ready to use.

Your Account Name is: ${mail_script:entitlement_api_key_created.company_name}
Your User ID is: ${mail_script:entitlement_api_key_created.email}
Your API key is: ${mail_script:entitlement_api_key_created.api_key}

 

Please click on ${mail_script:customer_api_key_created.registration_terms_doc_link} to review terms and conditions of usage.


Please do not reply to this email as the mailbox is not monitored. If you have questions or concerns then please send an email to apisupport@weather.com

Regards,

The TWC API Team
sysevent_email_action.name: Entitlement API Key Created Email
sysevent_email_action.subject: Thank you for registering for an API Key - API Key Provisioned
